name: Bananaz!
description:
What is this?

Bananaz is a platformer that I made in 3 days as an exercise for school. Imagine you play a monkey or some other cool Bananaz loving animal! You have to collect all the  Bananaz to get to the next level. Be cautious when you fall off the Islands you lose precious time! 

Controls

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
RETURN to restart

What I need to run this?

You need a PC which runs Windows, Mac or Linux (Mac and Linux not tested) with a little bit of performance.

Known Bugs
  • Sometimes controls don't work after a level load or restart (Restarting the game fixes the problem)
Liked it?

Feel free to give me feedback on this project. If you like what I am doing and you want to stay up to date follow me on Twitter!

Credits

 Assets from Kenney

Music from Dee Yan-Key

Bananaz model and animations from ME MYSELF AND I
